title: Mango Madness Murder
description: *This is book 15 in the Frosted Love Cozy Mystery Series*   In Missy’s last adventure of the Frosted Love series, each character that you’ve grown to know and love faces their moment of truth. Lives are changed, futures are determined, and a bittersweet mix of love and pain strikes the hearts of the major players in this final installment. Missy finds herself once again embroiled in a mystery that could ultimately destroy someone that she loves, and will be presented with a decision that will impact her for the rest of her life. author: Carol Durand
